name: Holy Knight - Godot C# Game Jam
name_original: Holy Knight - Godot C# Game Jam
description:
First game jam attempt (Godot C# Game Jam).  4 hours over deadline.

Point with Mouse, LMB to shoot

A or Left Arrow + D or Right arrow to move

Resources:

Godot

Ice Shard : Ice Shard Spell Effect by NYKNCK (itch.io)

DungeonTilesetII: 16x16 DungeonTileset II by 0x72 (itch.io)
